SEARCH
Package org.apache.calcite.sql

Enum SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding>
org.apache.calcite.sql.SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding>, Constable
Enclosing interface:
SqlWriterConfig
public static enum SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding extends Enum<SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding>
Policy for how to do deal with long lines.

The following examples all have ClauseEndsLine=true, Indentation=4, and FoldLength=25 (so that the long SELECT clause folds but the shorter GROUP BY clause does not).

Note that ClauseEndsLine is observed in STEP and TALL modes, and in CHOP mode when a line is long.

SQL formatted with each Folding value
Folding Example
WIDE 
 SELECT abc, def, ghi, jkl, mno, pqr
 FROM t
 GROUP BY abc, def
STEP 
 SELECT
     abc, def, ghi, jkl, mno, pqr
 FROM t
 GROUP BY
     abc, def
FOLD 
 SELECT abc, def, ghi,
     jkl, mno, pqr
 FROM t
 GROUP BY abc, def
CHOP 
 SELECT
     abc,
     def,
     ghi,
     jkl,
     mno,
     pqr
 FROM t
 GROUP BY abc, def
TALL 
 SELECT
     abc,
     def,
     ghi,
     jkl,
     mno,
     pqr
 FROM t
 GROUP BY
     abc,
     def

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    CHOP
    Chop down if long.
    FOLD
    Wrap if long.
    STEP
    As WIDE but start a new line if SqlWriterConfig.clauseEndsLine().
    TALL
    Wrap always.
    WIDE
    Do not wrap.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • WIDE

      public static final SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding WIDE
      Do not wrap. Items are on the same line, regardless of length.

    • STEP

      public static final SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding STEP
      As WIDE but start a new line if SqlWriterConfig.clauseEndsLine().

    • FOLD

      public static final SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding FOLD
      Wrap if long. Items are on the same line, but if the line's length exceeds SqlWriterConfig.foldLength(), move items to the next line.

    • CHOP

      public static final SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding CHOP
      Chop down if long. Items are on the same line, but if the line grows longer than SqlWriterConfig.foldLength(), put all items on separate lines.

    • TALL

      public static final SqlWriterConfig.LineFolding TALL
      Wrap always. Items are on separate lines.
